participant_1.name: Chloe
participant_1.personality: Chloe is outgoing and enjoys the finer things in life. She seeks attention and loves to indulge in her hobbies.
participant_1.background: i am high maintenance. i like to tan in tanning beds. i love spending money. i diet a lot. i love listening to britney spears.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Jake is health-conscious and enjoys staying active. He is down-to-earth and has a laid-back attitude towards life.
participant_2.background: i go to the gym regularly. i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. i've short hair. two dogs live with me. eating is something i do when i am bored.
